moves.1. e4: My favourite way to start of a game.
moves.1... e5: This is a move that it is quite often countered with.
moves.2. Nf3: I then bring my knight out.
moves.2... Nc6: My opponent brings his knight out to protect his pawn on e5.
moves.3. Bc4: I then do this move because most people do it against me so I thought it is a good move.
moves.3... Bc5: Black also brings his bishop out
moves.4. d3: I then push my pawn to d3 to protect the pawn and the bishop at the same time and also opening the line of my bishop on c1.
moves.4... Nf6: My opponent brings their knight out so that he can castle.
moves.5. Ng5: I don't always do this move but sometimes people don't castle putting me in a good position.
moves.5... O-O: Unfortunately, most people do castle and this is basically a beginning of a game that I have started from many times.
